title: Starting your own business. Parts. 1-3
creator_credit: Ron Tanner, Lloyds Bank and Millbank Films
brief_description: Designed to forewarn those considering self-employment that there is no easy recipe for success and relates the stories of three people who decided to be their own boss. Highlights basic business pointers and identifies the problems and pitfalls of going solo.
creator_credit_for_label: Ron Tanner, Lloyds Bank and Millbank Films
